name: Casinos, betting or other gambling related activity
description: Assessment of involvement in gambling activities including casinos, betting, online gambling, slot machines, gambling software, and related services. Excludes unregulated or illegal gambling operations.
field: casino, betting, online gambling, slot machines, gambling software or gambling-related services

Q1.text: Is the client involved in gambling through their activity?
Q1.summary: Gambling Verification - Is the client involved in gambling?

Q2.text: Is the client involved in unregulated or unlicensed online gambling activities?
Q2.summary: Prohibited Cases - Unregulated/unlicensed online gambling check

Q3.text: Is the client involved in gambling activities that are illegal in the country of operations?

Q4.text: Is the client involved in casinos, betting, online casinos, online betting, providing slot machines, gambling software, IT services for gambling, or payment services for gambling-related activities?
Q4.summary: Gambling Type Verification - Type of gambling activity

Q5.text: Does the client have direct engagement with gambling operations (casino owner/operator, bookmaker, gambling platform operator, or primary gambling service provider)?
Q5.summary: Direct Engagement - Direct operational involvement in gambling

Q6.text: Does the client hold an executive management or board of directors position in the gambling business?
Q6.summary: Substantial Connection - Executive or board position

Q7.text: Does the income from the gambling-related activity represent more than 10% of the client's total income?
Q7.summary: Substantial Connection - Income threshold for direct engagement (>10%)

Q8.text: Does the client have indirect involvement with gambling (equipment supplier, software developer, payment processor, marketing services, or investor in gambling companies)?
Q8.summary: Indirect Engagement - Supporting roles in gambling industry

Q9.text: Does the income from the gambling-related activity represent more than 25% of the client's total income?
Q9.summary: Substantial Connection - Income threshold for indirect engagement (>25%)

Q1_NO.reason: Client is not involved in gambling activities

Q2_YES.reason: Unregulated or unlicensed online gambling - relationship prohibited

Q3_YES.reason: Illegal gambling activities in country of operations - relationship prohibited

Q4_NO.reason: Client not involved in recognized gambling activity types

Q6_YES.reason: Direct gambling engagement with executive/board position requires Enhanced Due Diligence

Q7_YES.reason: Direct gambling engagement with income >10% requires Enhanced Due Diligence

Q7_NO.reason: Direct gambling engagement but income <=10% - SIAP without Enhanced Due Diligence

Q8_NO.reason: No direct or indirect gambling engagement identified

Q9_YES.reason: Indirect gambling engagement with income >25% requires Enhanced Due Diligence

Q9_NO.reason: Indirect gambling engagement but income <=25% - SIAP without Enhanced Due Diligence

notes.prohibited_verdict: PROHIBITED is a special verdict indicating the relationship cannot proceed - stricter than SIAP_EDD
